entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a person who has an opinion about Dumbledore trusting Snape. He is described as 'sagely' which means he is speaking with wisdom.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who is trusted by Harry and Hermione. He is accused of being 'cracked' for trusting Snape.

entities.name: snape

entities.name: hermione

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is frustrated by the argument between Ron and Hermione. He leaves them sitting there because of their constant arguing.

entities.name: you-know-who
